verses.verse: And all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their voice <S%H6963><s%>, and cried <S%H5414><s%>; and the people <S%H5971><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> that night <S%H3915><s%>.

And all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against Aaron <S%H175><s%>: and the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Would God <S%H3863><s%> that we had died <S%H4191><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>! or would God <S%H3863><s%> we had died <S%H4191><s%> in this wilderness <S%H4057><s%>!

And wherefore hath the LORD <S%H3068><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> us unto this land <S%H776><s%>, to fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>, that our wives <S%H802><s%> and our children <S%H2945><s%> should be a prey <S%H957><s%>? were it not better <S%H2896><s%> for us to return <S%H7725><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>?
And they said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H251><s%>, Let us make <S%H5414><s%> a captain <S%H7218><s%>, and let us return <S%H7725><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on their faces <S%H6440><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> all the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

¶ And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%>, which were of them that searched <S%H8446><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, rent <S%H7167><s%> their clothes <S%H899><s%>:

And they spake <S%H559><s%> unto all the company <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The land <S%H776><s%>, which we passed <S%H5674><s%> through to search <S%H8446><s%> it, is an exceeding <S%H3966><s%> <S%H3966><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%>.

If the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delight <S%H2654><s%> in us, then he will bring <S%H935><s%> us into this land <S%H776><s%>, and give <S%H5414><s%> it us; a land <S%H776><s%> which floweth <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>.

Only rebel <S%H4775><s%> not ye against the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, neither fear <S%H3372><s%> ye the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>; for they are bread <S%H3899><s%> for us: their defence <S%H6738><s%> is departed <S%H5493><s%> from them, and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is with us: fear <S%H3372><s%> them not.

But all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> bade <S%H559><s%> stone <S%H7275><s%> them with stones <S%H68><s%>. And the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> before all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

¶ And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, How long will this people <S%H5971><s%> provoke <S%H5006><s%> me? and how long will it be ere <S%H3808><s%> they believe <S%H539><s%> me, for all the signs <S%H226><s%> which I have shewed <S%H6213><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> them?

I will smite <S%H5221><s%> them with the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>, and disinherit <S%H3423><s%> them, and will make <S%H6213><s%> of thee a greater <S%H1419><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than they.

¶ And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, Then the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%> it, (for thou broughtest up <S%H5927><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%> in thy might <S%H3581><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> them;)

And they will tell <S%H559><s%> it to the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of this land <S%H776><s%>: for they have heard <S%H8085><s%> that thou LORD <S%H3068><s%> art among <S%H7130><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%>, that thou LORD <S%H3068><s%> art seen <S%H7200><s%> face <S%H5869><s%> to face <S%H5869><s%>, and that thy cloud <S%H6051><s%> standeth <S%H5975><s%> over them, and that thou goest <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, by day time <S%H3119><s%> in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of a cloud <S%H6051><s%>, and in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>.

¶ Now if thou shalt kill <S%H4191><s%> all this people <S%H5971><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, then the nations <S%H1471><s%> which have heard <S%H8085><s%> the fame <S%H8088><s%> of thee will speak <S%H559><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Because the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was not <S%H1115><s%> able <S%H3201><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which he sware <S%H7650><s%> unto them, therefore he hath slain <S%H7819><s%> them in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.
And now, I beseech thee, let the power <S%H3581><s%> of my Lord <S%H136><s%> be great <S%H1431><s%>, according <S%H834><s%> as thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is longsuffering <S%H750><s%> <S%H639><s%>, and of great <S%H7227><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%>, forgiving <S%H5375><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> and transgression <S%H6588><s%>, and by no means <S%H5352><s%> clearing <S%H5352><s%> the guilty, visiting <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> upon the children <S%H1121><s%> unto the third <S%H8029><s%> and fourth <S%H7256><s%> generation.

Pardon <S%H5545><s%>, I beseech thee, the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of this people <S%H5971><s%> according unto the greatness <S%H1433><s%> of thy mercy <S%H2617><s%>, and as thou hast forgiven <S%H5375><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%>, from Egypt <S%H4714><s%> even until now <S%H2008><s%>.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, I have pardoned <S%H5545><s%> according to thy word <S%H1697><s%>:
But as truly <S%H199><s%> as I live <S%H2416><s%>, all the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be filled <S%H4390><s%> with the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

Because all those men <S%H582><s%> which have seen <S%H7200><s%> my glory <S%H3519><s%>, and my miracles <S%H226><s%>, which I did <S%H6213><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and have tempted <S%H5254><s%> <S%H853><s%> me now these ten <S%H6235><s%> times <S%H6471><s%>, and have not hearkened <S%H8085><s%> to my voice <S%H6963><s%>;

Surely they shall not <S%H518><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which I sware <S%H7650><s%> unto their fathers <S%H1><s%>, neither shall any of them that provoked <S%H5006><s%> me see <S%H7200><s%> it:

But my servant <S%H5650><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%>, because <S%H6118><s%> he had another <S%H312><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> with him, and hath followed <S%H310><s%> me fully <S%H4390><s%>, him will I bring <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> whereinto he went <S%H935><s%>; and his seed <S%H2233><s%> shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

(Now the Amalekites <S%H6003><s%> and the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%>.) To morrow <S%H4279><s%> turn <S%H6437><s%> you, and get <S%H5265><s%> you into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>.
¶ And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

How long shall I bear with this evil <S%H7451><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%>, which murmur <S%H3885><s%> against me? I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the murmurings <S%H8519><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which they murmur <S%H3885><s%> against me.

Say <S%H559><s%> unto them, As truly as <S%H3808><s%> I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, as ye have spoken <S%H1696><s%> in mine ears <S%H241><s%>, so will I do <S%H6213><s%> to you:

Your carcases <S%H6297><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in this wilderness <S%H4057><s%>; and all that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of you, according to your whole number <S%H4557><s%>, from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%>, which have murmured <S%H3885><s%> against me,

Doubtless ye shall not <S%H518><s%> come <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%>, concerning which I sware <S%H3027><s%> <S%H5375><s%> to make you dwell <S%H7931><s%> therein, save Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%>, and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>.

But your little ones <S%H2945><s%>, which ye said <S%H559><s%> should be a prey <S%H957><s%>, them will I bring in <S%H935><s%>, and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which ye have despised <S%H3988><s%>.
But as for you, your carcases <S%H6297><s%>, they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> in this wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

And your children <S%H1121><s%> shall wander <S%H7462><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and bear <S%H5375><s%> your whoredoms <S%H2184><s%>, until your carcases <S%H6297><s%> be wasted <S%H8552><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>.

After the number <S%H4557><s%> of the days <S%H3117><s%> in which ye searched <S%H8446><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, even forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, each day <S%H3117><s%> for a year <S%H8141><s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H8141><s%>, shall ye bear <S%H5375><s%> your iniquities <S%H5771><s%>, even forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> my breach of promise <S%H8569><s%>.

I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have said <S%H1696><s%>, I will surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H2063><s%> unto all this evil <S%H7451><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%>, that are gathered together <S%H3259><s%> against me: in this wilderness <S%H4057><s%> they shall be consumed <S%H8552><s%>, and there they shall die <S%H4191><s%>.

And the men <S%H582><s%>, which Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to search <S%H8446><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, who returned <S%H7725><s%>, and made all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> to murmur <S%H3885><s%> <S%H3885><s%> against him, by bringing up <S%H3318><s%> a slander <S%H1681><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%>,

Even those <S%H582><s%> men <S%H582><s%> that did bring up <S%H3318><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> report <S%H1681><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%>, died <S%H4191><s%> by the plague <S%H4046><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

But Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%>, which were of the men <S%H1992><s%> <S%H582><s%> that went <S%H1980><s%> to search <S%H8446><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>, lived <S%H2421><s%> still.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> told <S%H1696><s%> these sayings <S%H1697><s%> unto all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and the people <S%H5971><s%> mourned <S%H56><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%>.

¶ And they rose up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and gat them up <S%H5927><s%> into the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mountain <S%H2022><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Lo <S%H2009><s%>, we be here, and will go up <S%H5927><s%> unto the place <S%H4725><s%> which the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath promised <S%H559><s%>: for we have sinned <S%H2398><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Wherefore now do ye transgress <S%H5674><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>? but it shall not prosper <S%H6743><s%>.
Go not up <S%H5927><s%>, for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is not among <S%H7130><s%> you; that ye be not smitten <S%H5062><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%>.

For the Amalekites <S%H6003><s%> and the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> are there before <S%H6440><s%> you, and ye shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>: because ye are turned <S%H7725><s%> away <S%H310><s%> from the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, therefore the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will not be with you.

But they presumed <S%H6075><s%> to go up <S%H5927><s%> unto the hill <S%H2022><s%> top <S%H7218><s%>: nevertheless the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and Moses <S%H4872><s%>, departed <S%H4185><s%> not out <S%H7130><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%>.

Then the Amalekites <S%H6003><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%>, and the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> which dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in that hill <S%H2022><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> them, and discomfited <S%H3807><s%> them, even unto Hormah <S%H2767><s%>.
